role.argrole: obsessed with what? (usually marked by ب)

example.parse: (S (NP-SBJ (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_NOM الياباني)) (PUNC ,) (PP (PREP على) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN سبيل) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN المثال)))) (ADJP-PRD (ADJ+CASE_INDEF_NOM مهووس) (PP (PREP ب) (NP (NP (NOUN_PROP تشيبوراشكا)) (PUNC ,) (NP (NP (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN بطل) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الصور) (DET+ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN المتحركة))) (ADJP (DET+ADJ+CASE_DEF_GEN المفضل))) (NP-ADV (NOUN لدى) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الاطفال) (DET+ADJ+CASE_DEF_GEN الروس)))))))
